trans-unit.source: Provides a threading service that allows the host application creating a workflow instance to donate the <xref href="System.Threading.Thread"></xref> on which the workflow instance is run.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um serviço de threading que permite que o aplicativo host criando uma instância de fluxo de trabalho Doe o <xref href="System.Threading.Thread"> </xref> no qual a instância de fluxo de trabalho é executada.

trans-unit.source: Using this threading service, host applications can run a workflow instance on a single <xref href="System.Threading.Thread"></xref> in synchronous mode (although if the workflow contains a delay activity, the work is postponed until after the delay activity is executed on a separate thread spawned by [System.Threading.Timer](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)).This mode blocks the execution of the host application until the workflow instance becomes idle.
trans-unit.target: Usando esse serviço de threading, hospedar aplicativos podem executar uma instância de fluxo de trabalho em um único <xref href="System.Threading.Thread"> </xref> no modo síncrono (embora se o fluxo de trabalho contém uma atividade de atraso, o trabalho é adiado até depois que a atividade de atraso é executada em um thread separado gerado pelo [System.Threading.Timer](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)). Esse modo bloqueia a execução do aplicativo host até que a instância de fluxo de trabalho ficar ociosa.

trans-unit.source: Subsequently, the workflow instance can only be executed using the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService.RunWorkflow*> method of this service.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, a instância de fluxo de trabalho só pode ser executada usando o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService.RunWorkflow*>método deste serviço.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService.RunWorkflow*>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] ManualWorkflowSchedulerService does not automatically run a workflow instance that is in the queue.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]ManualWorkflowSchedulerService não executa automaticamente uma instância de fluxo de trabalho que está na fila.

trans-unit.source: The host must call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService.RunWorkflow%2A> to run a specified workflow.
trans-unit.target: O host deve chamar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService.RunWorkflow%2A>para executar um fluxo de trabalho especificado.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService.RunWorkflow%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref> that determines how delay activities are handled.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref>que determina como são tratadas os atividades de atraso.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the scheduler service automatically resumes workflows after delay activities expire (by using an in-memory timer).
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, o serviço do Agendador retoma automaticamente fluxos de trabalho depois que as atividades de atraso expirarem (por meio de um timer na memória).

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the host must manually resume the workflow after the delay activities expire.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, o host deve retomar manualmente o fluxo de trabalho depois que as atividades de atraso expirarem.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"></xref> that contains parameters for `useActiveTimers`.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"> </xref> que contém parâmetros para `useActiveTimers`.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the scheduler service automatically resumes workflows after delay activities expire (by using an in-memory timer).
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, o serviço do Agendador retoma automaticamente fluxos de trabalho depois que as atividades de atraso expirarem (por meio de um timer na memória).

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the host must manually resume the workflow after the delay activities expire.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, o host deve retomar manualmente o fluxo de trabalho depois que as atividades de atraso expirarem.

trans-unit.source: Cancels the specified existing workflow instance work item.
trans-unit.target: Cancela o item especificado de trabalho de instância de fluxo de trabalho existente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> associated with the existing scheduled work item to cancel.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Guid>associado ao item de trabalho agendado existente para cancelar.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: Overloaded from <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStarted%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Sobrecarga de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStarted%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called whenever <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is called and is used by the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService"></xref> to do work that is needed when the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> starts.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado sempre que <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime%2A?displayProperty=fullName> é chamado e é usado pelo <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService"> </xref> para o trabalho necessário quando o <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"> </xref> inicia.

trans-unit.source: Runs the specified workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Executa a instância de fluxo de trabalho especificado.

trans-unit.source: This is a synchronous call that uses the current thread to run the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Isso é uma chamada síncrona que usa o thread atual para executar o fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: It does not return until the workflow idles, suspends, completes, terminates, or aborts.
trans-unit.target: Ele não retorna até que o fluxo de trabalho ocioso, suspende, concluído, termina ou anulada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> for the workflow instance to run.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Guid>para a instância de fluxo de trabalho seja executada.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the workflow starts running; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o fluxo de trabalho começa a ser executado; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: workflowInstanceId is an empty GUID.
trans-unit.target: workflowInstanceIdé um GUID vazio.

trans-unit.source: Adds a workflow instance to the pending work items queue using the specified workflow instance using the specified multicast delegate.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona uma instância de fluxo de trabalho para a fila de itens de trabalho pendentes usando a instância de fluxo de trabalho especificado usando o delegado multicast especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Threading.WaitCallback"></xref> multicast delegate that represents the method to run.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Threading.WaitCallback"> </xref> delegado multicast que representa o método a ser executado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Guid> that represents the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Guid>que representa a instância de fluxo de trabalho.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: callback contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: callbackcontém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified workflow instance to the pending work item queue using the specified multicast delegate, <xref:System.DateTime> and GUIDs.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona a instância de fluxo de trabalho especificado para a fila de itens de trabalho pendente usando o delegado multicast especificado, <xref:System.DateTime>e GUIDs.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Threading.WaitCallback"></xref> multicast delegate that represents the method to run.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Threading.WaitCallback"> </xref> delegado multicast que representa o método a ser executado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Guid> that represents the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Guid>que representa a instância de fluxo de trabalho.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> that indicates the time to begin running the thread.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.DateTime>que indica a hora para começar a executar o thread.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Guid> that represents the scheduled thread.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Guid>que representa o thread agendado.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: callback contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: callbackcontém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: workflowInstanceId or timerId is an empty GUID.
trans-unit.target: workflowInstanceIdou timerId é um GUID vazio.

trans-unit.source: Overloaded from <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Sobrecarga de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService"></xref> uses this method to do work that is needed when the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> stops.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService"> </xref> usa esse método para o trabalho necessário quando o <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"> </xref> para.
